short.am,ar,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4: Free product image & video downloader for THunt sellers!
short.bg,bn,ca,cs,da,et,fa,fil,gu,he,hr,kn,lt,: Free product image & video downloader for Temu sellers!
short.zh_CN: 免费的适用于Temu的商品图片和视频下载器，从Temu详情页选择和下载您需要的商品图片。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THunt Product Image Downloader is easy to use, so you don't need special skills to use it quickly. Download all product images and videos from THunt product detail pages with just one click.

Use THunt Product Image Downloader to batch download all product images with just one click.

THunt product image downloader function introduction:
✔️ Supports all THunt product images
✔️ View all pictures and videos of selected items
✔️Batch download all pictures at once

how to use?
- Install THunt Product Image Downloader extension.
- Enter the THunt website.
- Select the product for which you want to download pictures or videos.
- Find the image downloader icon on the right side of the product details page.
- In the pop-up window on the right, you can view all product pictures or videos.
- Click the "Package Download" button to download all product images and videos in one click.

Now you can download all the THunt merchandise images you may need. After installing this powerful image downloader extension, your work efficiency will be significantly improved. Don't wait, install this extension and save your time.

Don’t forget to share this simple and useful product image download extension with your friends.
long.zh_CN:
THunt商品图片下载器易于使用，因此您不需要特殊技能即可快速使用它。只需单击一下即可下载THunt商品详情页的所有商品图片和视频。

使用THunt商品图片下载器，只需单击一下即可批量下载所有商品图像。

Temu商品图片下载器功能简介：
✔️ 支持THunt所有商品图片
✔️ 查看所选商品的全部图片和视频
✔️一次性批量下载所有图片

如何使用？
- 安装THunt商品图片下载器扩展程序。
- 进入THunt网站。
- 选择您要下载图片或视频的商品。
- 在商品详情页右侧找到图片下载器的图标。
- 右侧弹出窗口，您可以查看全部商品图片或视频。
- 单击“打包下载”按钮一键下载全部商品图片和视频。

现在您可以下载您可能需要的所有THunt商品图像。安装这个功能强大的图片下载器扩展后，您的工作效率会达到显著的提升。不要等待快来安装这款扩展，节省您的时间。

不要忘记与您的朋友分享这款简单实用的商品图片下载扩展程序。
